text: Peter Nigel Huxford (born 17 February 1960) is an English former first-class cricketer. Huxford was born at Enfield in February 1960. He later studied at Christ Church College at the University of Oxford. While studying at Oxford, he played first-class cricket for Oxford University in 1980–81, making seven appearances. Playing as a wicket-keeper, he scored 27 runs and took three catches and made two stumpings. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:People from Enfield Town Category:Alumni of Christ Church, Oxford Category:English cricketers Category:Oxford University cricketers
title: Peter Huxford
